reviews.review_msg: She's really nice and helpfull one-on-one, but the lectures are painfully disorganized and hard to follow.

Although his exams are pretty tough, he is a reasonable marker. He cares a lot about his students and is always willing to take questions after class. He keeps the class interesting by cracking a few dad jokes here and there. Overall, a super great guy!
It was a great class. She really enjoys and understands the material and she is really helpful if you have any trouble.

terrible prof. rude and very cynical. plays favorites and likes to make jokes at student's expense. Blatantly angry and hostile towards men, she even said 'boys suck' and went to explain that there were probably at least 4 good guys in the class though(there were 20 or so guys in total). I didnt spend $500 to listen to her irrelevant tirades.

LOVED this class--lecture was amazing and always interesting--she's hilarious!  It was a LOT of work (partly because we had no final exam), but I learned so much--very helpful in prepping for higher level courses.  Can't wait to take another class with her!

Her lectures were useless because of the nature of the class and the essay topics being so streamlined that you need to do hours of research in areas not irrelevant, but removed from the lectures. The work load was ridiculous, but she is a lovely lady.
Dr. Uszkalo is an amazing professor. She engages her students really well. Do not take this course expecting an easy mark, there is a lot of work. The TA'S were amazing.

This was a very enlightening but a hard course. It requires a lot of in-depth thinking and efforts. Exam was difficult, and the research paper left me worrying all night. However, as long as the student puts in enough efforts and always seeks for extra help from the prof, it should not be a problem. Awesome prof and a great course :)

She is very nice and more than willing to help but she is also very vague in her assignment guidelines. VERY HARD MARKER! Her lectures were not very informative and when you ask a question she provides a very wordy response that leaves you more confused! Assignments need to be evenly distributed instead of all at the end of semester
My favorite prof. She is so popular that her classes are ridiculously hard to get in to. But if you have the opportunity, you should def get in on one of her classes!
Absolutely amazing, you could not ask for a better teacher, encourages creativity and is very interesting. Possibly the best course I've had so far, but be ready to work.
He is a good lecturer and prof but the material was just too difficult for me. Make sure you study his lectures and read the material, the final is based on his lectures. Marks hard on papers...

Fantastic, engaging prof with clear and accurate interpretations of material. Early Modern texts are challenging- he turns them into a cakewalk. Though the subject material becomes easier to digest and write about, your material will be critically evaluated (so, write well). Like a lot of eng. profs: he's crazy but that's good.
